original_text: When Joash had been king for 23 years, the priests had still not made any repairs to the temple.
korean_text: 요아스 왕 제이십삼년에 이르도록 제사장들이 성전의 파손한 데를 수리하지 아니하였는지라

sentences.original_text: When Joash had been king for 23 years,
sentences.korean_translation: 요아스가 왕이 된 지 23년이 되었을 때,

sentences.original_text: the priests had still not made any repairs
